entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 March 2023
